description: Construction of single storey rear extension, rear dormer to main roof and outrigger roof extension, extension of outrigger to form mono-pitched roof. Additional windows to front elevation on first and second floors and installation of roof lights
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-b4770f1a-7fff-c7af-5514-fe7dee342bf7"></span></p><div><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; text-align: justify;">The proposed first and second floor front elevation windows, by reason of their inappropriate design and positioning, would appear as an incongruous and discordant addition that harmfully disrupts the established uniformity, traditional window proportions and overall character of the site, terrace and surrounding area. As such, the proposal is contrary to Policy D3 (Optimising site capacity through a design-led approach) of the London Plan (2021), Policy LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) of the Hackney Local Plan (LP33), and the guidance set out in the Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2009).</span></div>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2e34ed04-7fff-3e8a-7a5d-082941919784"></span></p><div><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; white-space-collapse: preserve; text-align: justify;">The cumulative impact of the proposed ground floor rear, dormer roof and rear outrigger extensions, by reasons of inappropriate scale, location and detailed design would comprise an overly prominent, uncharacteristic and discordant set of additions which would be detrimental to the character and appearance of the application site and wider terrace of which it forms part. As such, the proposal is contrary to Policies D3 (Optimising site capacity through a design-led approach) of the London Plan (2021), LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) of the Hackney Local Plan (LP33), and the Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2009).</span></div>
